```js
<html>
<head>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    function Multiply(obj, val) {
      alert(obj.value * val);
    }
  </script>
</head>
<body>
  <input type="text" onchange ="Multiply(this, 2);" />
</body>
</html>
```
